mapper.select: SELECT * from ( SELECT ir.*, lf.place_name as fromPlaceName, lt.place_name as toPlaceName, lf.place_code as fromPlaceCode, lt.place_code as toPlaceCode FROM invrecord as ir LEFT JOIN location as lf ON ir.place_from = lf.id LEFT JOIN location as lt ON ir.place_to = lt.id ) AS q ${ew.customSqlSegment}
